channel.title: Geely on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Geely on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Automaker Geely Launched Its Own Satellites Into Space, Highlighting China’s Ambitions
item.description: It’s a bird, it’s a plane—it’s the latest sign that Chinese automakers intend to dominate the global car industry for decades to come.
